an5.180:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam carati mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim.
an5.180:1.2: Addasa kho bhagava addhanamaggappatipanno annatarasmim padese mahantam salavanam;
an5.180:1.3: disvana magga okkamma yena tam salavanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam salavanam ajjhogahetva annatarasmim padese sitam patvakasi.
an5.180:2.2: “ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa patukammaya?
an5.180:2.4: Atha kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.180:2.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa patukammaya?
an5.180:3.1: “Bhutapubbam, ananda, imasmim padese nagaram ahosi iddhanceva phitanca bahujanam akinnamanussam.
an5.180:3.2: Tam kho panananda, nagaram kassapo bhagava araham sammasambuddho upanissaya vihasi.
an5.180:3.3: Kassapassa kho panananda, bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa gavesi nama upasako ahosi silesu aparipurakari.
an5.180:3.4: Gavesina kho, ananda, upasakena pancamattani upasakasatani patidesitani samadapitani ahesum silesu aparipurakarino.
an5.180:3.5: Atha kho, ananda, gavesissa upasakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:3.6: ‘aham kho imesam pancannam upasakasatanam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta, ahancamhi silesu aparipurakari, imani ca panca upasakasatani silesu aparipurakarino.
an5.180:4.1: Atha kho, ananda, gavesi upasako yena tani panca upasakasatani tenupasankami; upasankamitva tani panca upasakasatani etadavoca:
an5.180:4.3: Atha kho, ananda, tesam pancannam upasakasatanam etadahosi:
an5.180:4.4: ‘ayyo kho gavesi amhakam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta.
an5.180:4.5: Ayyo hi nama gavesi silesu paripurakari bhavissati.
an5.180:4.7: Atha kho, ananda, tani panca upasakasatani yena gavesi upasako tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva gavesim upasakam etadavocum:
an5.180:4.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesi imanipi panca upasakasatani silesu paripurakarino dharetu’ti.
an5.180:4.9: Atha kho, ananda, gavesissa upasakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:4.10: ‘aham kho imesam pancannam upasakasatanam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta, ahancamhi silesu paripurakari, imanipi panca upasakasatani silesu paripurakarino.
an5.180:5.1: Atha kho, ananda, gavesi upasako yena tani panca upasakasatani tenupasankami; upasankamitva tani panca upasakasatani etadavoca:
an5.180:5.2: ‘ajjatagge mam ayasmanto brahmacarim dharetha aracarim viratam methuna gamadhamma’ti.
an5.180:5.3: Atha kho, ananda, tesam pancannam upasakasatanam etadahosi:
an5.180:5.4: ‘ayyo kho gavesi amhakam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta.
an5.180:5.5: Ayyo hi nama gavesi brahmacari bhavissati aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an5.180:5.7: Atha kho, ananda, tani panca upasakasatani yena gavesi upasako tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva gavesim upasakam etadavocum:
an5.180:5.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesi imanipi panca upasakasatani brahmacarino dharetu aracarino virata methuna gamadhamma’ti.
an5.180:5.9: Atha kho, ananda, gavesissa upasakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:5.10: ‘aham kho imesam pancannam upasakasatanam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta.
an5.180:5.13: Ahancamhi brahmacari aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an5.180:5.14: Imanipi panca upasakasatani brahmacarino aracarino virata methuna gamadhamma.
an5.180:6.1: Atha kho, ananda, gavesi upasako yena tani panca upasakasatani tenupasankami; upasankamitva tani panca upasakasatani etadavoca:
an5.180:6.2: ‘ajjatagge mam ayasmanto ekabhattikam dharetha rattuparatam viratam vikalabhojana’ti.
an5.180:6.3: Atha kho, ananda, tesam pancannam upasakasatanam etadahosi:
an5.180:6.5: Ayyo hi nama gavesi ekabhattiko bhavissati rattuparato virato vikalabhojana.
an5.180:6.7: Atha kho, ananda, tani panca upasakasatani yena gavesi upasako tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva gavesim upasakam etadavocum:
an5.180:6.8: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesi imanipi panca upasakasatani ekabhattike dharetu rattuparate virate vikalabhojana’ti.
an5.180:6.9: Atha kho, ananda, gavesissa upasakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:6.10: ‘aham kho imesam pancannam upasakasatanam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta.
an5.180:6.13: Ahancamhi brahmacari aracari virato methuna gamadhamma.
an5.180:6.14: Imanipi panca upasakasatani brahmacarino aracarino virata methuna gamadhamma.
an5.180:6.16: Imanipi panca upasakasatani ekabhattika rattuparata virata vikalabhojana.
an5.180:7.1: Atha kho, ananda, gavesi upasako yena kassapo bhagava araham sammasambuddho tenupasankami; upasankamitva kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddham etadavoca:
an5.180:7.2: ‘labheyyaham, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam labheyyam upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:7.3: Alattha kho, ananda, gavesi upasako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa santike pabbajjam, alattha upasampadam.
an5.180:7.4: Acirupasampanno kho panananda, gavesi bhikkhu eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
an5.180:7.5: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti abbhannasi.
an5.180:7.6: Annataro ca panananda, gavesi bhikkhu arahatam ahosi.
an5.180:8.1: Atha kho, ananda, tesam pancannam upasakasatanam etadahosi:
an5.180:8.2: ‘ayyo kho gavesi amhakam bahupakaro pubbangamo samadapeta.
an5.180:8.3: Ayyo hi nama gavesi kesamassum oharetva kasayani vatthani acchadetva agarasma anagariyam pabbajissati.
an5.180:8.5: Atha kho, ananda, tani panca upasakasatani yena kassapo bhagava araham sammasambuddho tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva kassapam bhagavantam arahantam sammasambuddham etadavocum:
an5.180:8.6: ‘labheyyama mayam, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjam, labheyyama upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:8.7: Alabhimsu kho, ananda, tani panca upasakasatani kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammasambuddhassa santike pabbajjam, alabhimsu upasampadam.
an5.180:9.1: Atha kho, ananda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi:
an5.180:9.2: ‘aham kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikamalabhi homi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an5.180:9.3: Aho vatimanipi panca bhikkhusatani imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikamalabhino assu akicchalabhino akasiralabhino’ti.
an5.180:9.4: Atha kho, ananda, tani panca bhikkhusatani vupakattha appamatta atapino pahitatta viharanta nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—
an5.180:9.5: brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharimsu.
an5.180:9.6: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti abbhannimsu.
an5.180:10.1: Iti kho, ananda, tani panca bhikkhusatani gavesipamukhani uttaruttari panitapanitam vayamamana anuttaram vimuttim sacchakamsu.
